extracted_information: The Hong Kong Judiciary provides an online judgment database accessible through its website. This database includes categories such as 'Judgments', 'Newly Added Judgments', 'Reasons for Verdict', and 'Reasons for Sentence'. 'Newly Added Judgments' are defined as those uploaded within the last six working days. For judgments not available on the website, access policy requires directing an application to the relevant court registry with justifications. No specific disclaimers regarding case usage or copyright were found in the provided content.

features.name: Judgment Categories
features.description: The online database categorizes judgments into 'Judgments', 'Newly Added Judgments', 'Reasons for Verdict', and 'Reasons for Sentence'.

features.name: Newly Added Judgments
features.description: Judgments uploaded within the last six working days.

access_policies.online_access: Direct access via website links for available judgments.
access_policies.offline_or_unavailable_judgments: To obtain copies of judgments not available on the website, an application must be directed to the relevant court registry with justifications.

disclaimers_about_case_usage: Not found in the provided content.
